attributes.action: ABOLISH THE POST OF DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I PROPOSE THAT THE POST OF DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER IS ABOLISHED ON THE GROUNDS THAT IT IS TOTALLY UNNECESSARY AND IS AN UNJUSTIFIABLE WASTE OF TAXPAYERS' MONEY.
